title: Police Seek Thomas Everette Chester, Wanted for Murder
body:
The Prince George's County Police Department is seeking the public's assistance with information on the whereabouts of Thomas Everette Chester. Chester is wanted for the murder of Brian Keith Tann that occurred on January 12, 2012.Anyone with information that may assist police in locating Thomas Everette Chester is asked to call the Prince George's County Police Department's Homicide Unit at (301)-772-4925.  You may also call the Prince George's County Crime Solvers Tip Line at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477).  Thomas Everette Chester is considered to be armed and dangerous.
